name: F.A.S.T baby
description:
Is your baby bored by tapping and popping balloons or bubbles on the screen? Are you looking for an app that will bring your Baby something completely new?

Then this app is right for you. Your baby can tap anywhere on the screen to switch the randomly generated spiral. After some seconds of inactivity, the spiral changes automatically.

Babies love spirals. Why I know that? Guess... :)

There is also a daddy app available. Look for "F.A.S.T"
